attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
time = 5
response = ''

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/administration/iscsiinitiator"

try:
  response = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, timeout=time, verify=False)
  get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
  iqn = get_iscsiinitiator["entities"][0]["initiatorname"]
except Exception as e:
  if response == "":
    print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller or controller not reachable."
  else:
    get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
    status = get_iscsiinitiator['message']['titleDescription']
    print "ERROR Message: {0}: Response code:({1}).".format(status,response.status_code)
    exit(1)

print "INFO: Initiator Name successfully acquired: {}.".format(iqn)

print "INITIATOR_IQN=" + iqn

#script

hycu = '@@{HYCU_HOSTNAME}@@'
prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
time = 30
status ={'200':'INFO: UUID sucessfully acquired.','201':'INFO: Container succesfully created.','401':'ERROR: Invalid username or password for storage cluster.','202':'ERROR: Creating Storage Container','422':'A storage container already exists' }
count = 1
finish = 13
key = ''

if hycu == "" :
    hycu = 'HYCU_Controller-'

storage_container_name = hycu + "-HYCU-CONTAINER"

api_url = prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/storage_containers"

print "Creating Container for ABS target: {}.".format(storage_container_name)

while(True):
  payload = {
    "compression_delay_in_secs": 3600,
    "compression_enabled": "true",
    "enable_software_encryption": "false",
    "finger_print_on_write": "off",
    "name": storage_container_name
  }
  index = count  
  count += 1
  response = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, timeout=time)
  key = response.status_code
  key = str(key)
  print (status[key])
  if key == "201":
    break
  elif key == "422":
    storage_container_name = storage_container_name + "-" + str(index)
    print "INFO: Added index to Container Name '{}'".format(index)
    print "Retrying in 5 seconds"
    sleep(5)
  else:
    print "Retrying in 5 seconds."
    sleep (5)
  if count == finish:
    print "ERROR: Failed to create Container '{}'. Terminating".format(storage_container_name)
    exit(1)
    
count = 1

uuid_url = api_url + "/?search_string=" + storage_container_name

while (True):
  count += 1
  response = urlreq(uuid_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False, timeout=time)
  key = response.status_code
  key = str(key)
  print (status[key])
  if key == "200":
    break
  else:
    print "INFO: Retrying in 5 seconds"
    sleep(5)
  if count == finish:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get Container '{}' UUID. Terminating".format(storage_container_name)
    exit(1)
  
storage_containers = json.loads(response.content)
storage_container_uuid = storage_containers["entities"][0]["storage_container_uuid"]

print (status[key]) + " Container name: '{0}', uuid:'{1}'".format(storage_container_name, storage_container_uuid)
print "CONTAINER_UUID=" + storage_container_uuid

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
hycu_username = 'admin'
hycu_password = 'admin'
username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
target_name = "NutanixABS"
data_service_port = "3260"
target_iqn = "@@{TARGET_IQN}@@"
prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
count = 1
finish = 6

iscsi_api =  prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/cluster/"
hycu_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0" + "/targets"

print "INFO: Acquiring iSCSI Data Services IP from '{}' storage cluster".format(prism_ip)
response = urlreq(iscsi_api, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
iscsi = json.loads(response.content)
dataIP = iscsi['cluster_external_data_services_ipaddress']
externalIP = iscsi['cluster_external_ipaddress']

if dataIP != None:
  print "INFO: Data Service IP acquired '{}'".format(dataIP)
else:
  print "INFO: Data Service IP does not exists on this storage cluster, using cluster virutal IP".format(externalIP)
  dataIP = externalIP
    
print "INFO: Checking existance of target on HYCU '{}'".format(hycu_ip)

response = urlreq(hycu_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)

for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    target_name = '@@{HYCU_HOSTNAME}@@' + "-" + target_name

print "Creating target '{}' on controller".format(target_name)

payload ={
  "name": target_name,
  "description": "",
  "targetType": "I_SCSI",
  "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
  "encryption": "False",
  "iScsiStorageDetails": {
    "port": data_service_port,
    "address": dataIP,
    "chap": "False",
    "targetname": target_iqn,
    "username": "",
    "password": "",
    "mutualChap": "False"
    }
}

try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(hycu_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
    print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name)
  print e.message
  exit(1)

jobs_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/jobs/" + job_uuid

while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'. Retrying in 5 seconds.".format(job_uuid)
    count +=1
    sleep(5)
  if response.status_code == 500:
    print "ERROR: Server internal error, retrying in 5 seconds".format(job_uuid)
    count += 1
    sleep(5)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: Adding ABS target '{0}', uuid '{1}' successful.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
    print "INFO: Adding ABS target '{0}', uuid '{1}' successful with warning.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Adding ABS Target '{0}', uuid '{1}' failed.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: Getting job status '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(job_uuid)
    sleep(5)

variable_list.description: Size in TB of Nutanix ABS target for HYCU backups
variable_list.name: STORAGE_SIZE_TB

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
afs_type = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE}@@"
afs_host = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST}@@"
afs_sharedpath = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH}@@"
smb_username = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_USERNAME}@@"
smb_password = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_PASSWORD}@@"
smb_domain = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_DOMAIN}@@"
target_size = @@{STORAGE_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024
target_name = "AFS" + afs_type + "Target"
count = 1
finish = 13

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

afs_type = afs_type.upper()

if afs_type == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' is a mandatory variable. Terminating"
  exit(1)
      
if afs_host == "" and afs_sharedpath == "" and target_name == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST', 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH', 'TARGET_NAME' are a mandatory variable. Terminating."
  exit(1)
  
test_target_url = api_url + "/targets/test"
index = 0
headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}

while(True):
  if index == 0:
    check_name = target_name
  else:
    check_name = target_name + "-" + str(index)
  print check_name
  payload = {
    "name": check_name
  }
  response = urlreq(test_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  check = json.loads(response.content)
  if check["message"]["details"] != "targets.name.exists.err":
    target_name = check_name
    break
  index += 1
  
if afs_type == 'NFS':
  print "INFO: Creating NFS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
    "name": target_name,
    "description": "",
    "targetType": "NFS",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": "False",
    "nfsFileSystemDetails": {
      "address": afs_host,
      "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath
    },
    "advertisedCapacityInBytes": target_size
  }

elif afs_type == 'SMB':
  print "INFO: Creating ABS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
    "name": target_name,
    "description": "",
    "targetType": "SMB",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": "False",
    "smbFileSystemDetails": {
      "username": smb_username,
      "password": smb_password,
      "domain": smb_domain,
      "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath,
      "address": afs_host
    }
  }
  
else:
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' can only be 'SMB/NFS'.".format(afs_type)
  exit(1)
   
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
    print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name)
  print e.message
  exit(1)
  

jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid

while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code == 200:
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' successful with Warning".format(target_name)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' in-progress retrying in 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
      sleep(5)

variable_list.description: Protocol to expose Nutanix Files storage (NFS or SMB)
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE

variable_list.description: Nutanix Files hostname
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST

variable_list.description: Nutanix Files share
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH

variable_list.description: Domain name, only if configuring SMB
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_SMB_DOMAIN

variable_list.description: Admin account user name, only if configuring SMB
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_SMB_USERNAME

variable_list.description: Admin account password, only if configuring SMB
variable_list.name: NTX_EXISTING_SMB_PASSWORD

variable_list.description: Size in TB of Nutanix Files share for HYCU backups
variable_list.name: STORAGE_SIZE_TB

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM hostname
variable_list.name: HYCU_HOSTNAME

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM static IP
variable_list.name: HYCU_IP

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM network subnet prefix
variable_list.name: HYCU_SUBNET_PREFIX

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM network gateway
variable_list.name: HYCU_GATEWAY

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM network DNS
variable_list.name: HYCU_DNS

variable_list.description: HYCU controller VM network domain
variable_list.name: HYCU_DOMAIN

variable_list.description: Nutanix production cluster/s HYCU will protect (ex. https://cluster1:port1,https://cluster2:port2,...)
variable_list.name: NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTERS_URL

variable_list.description: Nutanix storage cluster URL hosting HYCU controller VM (ex. https://cluster:port)
variable_list.name: NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
count = 1
finish = 9
time = 5

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/administration/httpserver"

print "INFO: Check availability of HYCU services."
sleep(120)
while(count < finish):
  try:
    response = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, timeout=time, verify=False)
    get_api_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if get_api_status["message"]["type"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: HYCU services are up."
      break
  except Exception as e:
    print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
    sleep(10)
    count += 1

if count == finish:
  print "ERROR: Timout waiting for HYCU service '{}'.".format(hycu_ip)
  exit(1)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = '@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTERS_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
count = 1
finish = 13
time = 30
response = ''

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  pe_ip = str.strip(pe_ip)
  count += 1
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: Wrong entry on position: '{}', enrty will be skipped.".format(count)
    continue

  payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=time)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
  count = 1
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True or count < finish):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
      if response.status_code == 500:
        print "ERROR: Server internal error, retrying in 5 seconds".format(job_uuid)
        count += 1
        sleep(5)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
#pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
pe_password = 'Nutanix123#'
response = ''
count = 1
finish = 13

if pe_ip == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL' should not be empty".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
if pe_username == "" or pe_password == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_CREDENTIALS' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
}

create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"

try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code == 200:
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: creation of Cluster '{}' in-progress retrying in 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for deleting an application. Deletes created VMs as well
action_list.name: action_delete

action_list.description: System action for starting an application
action_list.name: action_start

action_list.description: System action for stopping an application
action_list.name: action_stop

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
time = 5
response = ''

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/administration/iscsiinitiator"

try:
  response = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, timeout=time, verify=False)
  get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
  iqn = get_iscsiinitiator["entities"][0]["initiatorname"]
except Exception as e:
  if response == "":
    print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller or controller not reachable."
  else:
    get_iscsiinitiator = json.loads(response.content)
    status = get_iscsiinitiator['message']['titleDescription']
    print "ERROR Message: {0}: Response code:({1}).".format(status,response.status_code)
    exit(1)

print "INFO: Initiator Name successfully acquired: {}.".format(iqn)

print "INITIATOR_IQN=" + iqn

#script

hycu = '@@{HYCU_HOSTNAME}@@'
prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
time = 30
status ={'200':'INFO: UUID sucessfully acquired.','201':'INFO: Container succesfully created.','401':'ERROR: Invalid username or password for storage cluster.','202':'ERROR: Creating Storage Container','422':'A storage container already exists' }
count = 1
finish = 13
key = ''

if hycu == "" :
    hycu = 'HYCU_Controller-'

storage_container_name = hycu + "-HYCU-CONTAINER"

api_url = prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/storage_containers"

print "Creating Container for ABS target: {}.".format(storage_container_name)

while(True):
  payload = {
    "compression_delay_in_secs": 3600,
    "compression_enabled": "true",
    "enable_software_encryption": "false",
    "finger_print_on_write": "off",
    "name": storage_container_name
  }
  index = count  
  count += 1
  response = urlreq(api_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, timeout=time)
  key = response.status_code
  key = str(key)
  print (status[key])
  if key == "201":
    break
  elif key == "422":
    storage_container_name = storage_container_name + "-" + str(index)
    print "INFO: Added index to Container Name '{}'".format(index)
    print "Retrying in 5 seconds"
    sleep(5)
  else:
    print "Retrying in 5 seconds."
    sleep (5)
  if count == finish:
    print "ERROR: Failed to create Container '{}'. Terminating".format(storage_container_name)
    exit(1)
    
count = 1

uuid_url = api_url + "/?search_string=" + storage_container_name

while (True):
  count += 1
  response = urlreq(uuid_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False, timeout=time)
  key = response.status_code
  key = str(key)
  print (status[key])
  if key == "200":
    break
  else:
    print "INFO: Retrying in 5 seconds"
    sleep(5)
  if count == finish:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get Container '{}' UUID. Terminating".format(storage_container_name)
    exit(1)
  
storage_containers = json.loads(response.content)
storage_container_uuid = storage_containers["entities"][0]["storage_container_uuid"]

print (status[key]) + " Container name: '{0}', uuid:'{1}'".format(storage_container_name, storage_container_uuid)
print "CONTAINER_UUID=" + storage_container_uuid

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
hycu_username = 'admin'
hycu_password = 'admin'
username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
target_name = "NutanixABS"
data_service_port = "3260"
target_iqn = "@@{TARGET_IQN}@@"
prism_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
count = 1
finish = 6

iscsi_api =  prism_ip + "/PrismGateway/services/rest/v2.0/cluster/"
hycu_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0" + "/targets"

print "INFO: Acquiring iSCSI Data Services IP from '{}' storage cluster".format(prism_ip)
response = urlreq(iscsi_api, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
iscsi = json.loads(response.content)
dataIP = iscsi['cluster_external_data_services_ipaddress']
externalIP = iscsi['cluster_external_ipaddress']

if dataIP != None:
  print "INFO: Data Service IP acquired '{}'".format(dataIP)
else:
  print "INFO: Data Service IP does not exists on this storage cluster, using cluster virutal IP".format(externalIP)
  dataIP = externalIP
    
print "INFO: Checking existance of target on HYCU '{}'".format(hycu_ip)

response = urlreq(hycu_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, verify=False)
targets = json.loads(response.content)

for target in targets['entities']:
  if target['name'] == target_name:
    target_name = '@@{HYCU_HOSTNAME}@@' + "-" + target_name

print "Creating target '{}' on controller".format(target_name)

payload ={
  "name": target_name,
  "description": "",
  "targetType": "I_SCSI",
  "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
  "encryption": "False",
  "iScsiStorageDetails": {
    "port": data_service_port,
    "address": dataIP,
    "chap": "False",
    "targetname": target_iqn,
    "username": "",
    "password": "",
    "mutualChap": "False"
    }
}

try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(hycu_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
    print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name)
  print e.message
  exit(1)

jobs_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/jobs/" + job_uuid

while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=hycu_username, passwd=hycu_password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code != 200:
    print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'. Retrying in 5 seconds.".format(job_uuid)
    count +=1
    sleep(5)
  if response.status_code == 500:
    print "ERROR: Server internal error, retrying in 5 seconds".format(job_uuid)
    count += 1
    sleep(5)
  job_status = json.loads(response.content)
  if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
    print "INFO: Adding ABS target '{0}', uuid '{1}' successful.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
    print "INFO: Adding ABS target '{0}', uuid '{1}' successful with warning.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    break
  elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
    print "ERROR: Adding ABS Target '{0}', uuid '{1}' failed.".format(target_name,job_uuid)
    print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
    exit(1)
  else:
    print "INFO: Getting job status '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(job_uuid)
    sleep(5)

variable_list.description: Size in TB of Nutanix ABS target for HYCU backups
variable_list.name: STORAGE_SIZE_TB

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
afs_type = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE}@@"
afs_host = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST}@@"
afs_sharedpath = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH}@@"
smb_username = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_USERNAME}@@"
smb_password = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_PASSWORD}@@"
smb_domain = "@@{NTX_EXISTING_SMB_DOMAIN}@@"
target_size = @@{STORAGE_SIZE_TB}@@*1024*1024*1024*1024
target_name = "AFS" + afs_type + "Target"
count = 1
finish = 13

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

afs_type = afs_type.upper()

if afs_type == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' is a mandatory variable. Terminating"
  exit(1)
      
if afs_host == "" and afs_sharedpath == "" and target_name == "":
  print "INFO: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_HOST', 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_SHARED_PATH', 'TARGET_NAME' are a mandatory variable. Terminating."
  exit(1)
  
test_target_url = api_url + "/targets/test"
index = 0
headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}

while(True):
  if index == 0:
    check_name = target_name
  else:
    check_name = target_name + "-" + str(index)
  print check_name
  payload = {
    "name": check_name
  }
  response = urlreq(test_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  check = json.loads(response.content)
  if check["message"]["details"] != "targets.name.exists.err":
    target_name = check_name
    break
  index += 1
  
if afs_type == 'NFS':
  print "INFO: Creating NFS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
    "name": target_name,
    "description": "",
    "targetType": "NFS",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": "False",
    "nfsFileSystemDetails": {
      "address": afs_host,
      "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath
    },
    "advertisedCapacityInBytes": target_size
  }

elif afs_type == 'SMB':
  print "INFO: Creating ABS target '{}'.".format(target_name)
  payload = {
    "name": target_name,
    "description": "",
    "targetType": "SMB",
    "allowedBackupStreams": 1,
    "encryption": "False",
    "smbFileSystemDetails": {
      "username": smb_username,
      "password": smb_password,
      "domain": smb_domain,
      "sharedPath": afs_sharedpath,
      "address": afs_host
    }
  }
  
else:
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_EXISTING_AFS_TYPE' can only be 'SMB/NFS'.".format(afs_type)
  exit(1)
   
create_target_url = api_url + "/targets"
try:
  headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
  response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers)
  if response.status_code != 202:
    print "ERROR: creation of target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
  target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
  job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
  print "ERROR: Creation of target '{}' failed, check username/password".format(target_name)
  print e.message
  exit(1)
  

jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid

while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code == 200:
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' successful.".format(target_name)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' successful with Warning".format(target_name)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding target '{}' failed.".format(target_name)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Adding target '{}' in-progress retrying in 5 seconds.".format(target_name)
      sleep(5)

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
count = 1
finish = 9
time = 5

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/administration/httpserver"

print "INFO: Check availability of HYCU services."
sleep(120)
while(count < finish):
  try:
    response = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, timeout=time, verify=False)
    get_api_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if get_api_status["message"]["type"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: HYCU services are up."
      break
  except Exception as e:
    print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
    sleep(10)
    count += 1

if count == finish:
  print "ERROR: Timout waiting for HYCU service '{}'.".format(hycu_ip)
  exit(1)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = '@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTERS_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
count = 1
finish = 13
time = 30
response = ''

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  pe_ip = str.strip(pe_ip)
  count += 1
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: Wrong entry on position: '{}', enrty will be skipped.".format(count)
    continue

  payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=time)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
  count = 1
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True or count < finish):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
      if response.status_code == 500:
        print "ERROR: Server internal error, retrying in 5 seconds".format(job_uuid)
        count += 1
        sleep(5)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
#pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
pe_password = 'Nutanix123#'
response = ''
count = 1
finish = 13

if pe_ip == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL' should not be empty".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
if pe_username == "" or pe_password == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_CREDENTIALS' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
}

create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"

try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code == 200:
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: creation of Cluster '{}' in-progress retrying in 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall

      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)

  except Exception as e:

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
#pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'

finish = 13

if pe_ip == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL' should not be empty".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
if pe_username == "" or pe_password == "":
  print "ERROR: 'NTX_CREDENTIALS' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip)
  exit(1)
  
api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
}

create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"

try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=30)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
while(True or count < finish):
  response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
  if response.status_code == 200:
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: creation of Cluster '{}' in-progress retrying in 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

action_list.name: action_delete

attrs.script:
#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
count = 1
finish = 9
time = 5

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0/administration/httpserver"

print "INFO: Check availability of HYCU services."
sleep(120)
while(count < finish):
  try:
    response = urlreq(api_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, timeout=time, verify=False)
    get_api_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if get_api_status["message"]["type"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: HYCU services are up."
      break
  except Exception as e:
    print "INFO: Waiting for HYCU to start service."
    sleep(10)
    count += 1

if count == finish:
  print "ERROR: Timout waiting for HYCU service '{}'.".format(hycu_ip)
  exit(1)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ips = '@@{NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTERS_URL}@@'
pe_username = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.username}@@'
pe_password = '@@{NTX_CREDENTIALS.secret}@@'
count = 1
finish = 13
time = 30
response = ''

if pe_ips == "":
  "INFO: 'NTX_PRODUCTION_CLUSTER_URL' were not specified exiting.".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(0)
  
if pe_username == "" and pe_password == "":
  "ERROR: 'NTX_PRISM_USER_FOR_HYCU' should not be empty, plese fill in the PRISM credentials for hycu".format(pe_ip) 
  exit(1)

api_url = "https://" + hycu_ip + ":8443/rest/v1.0"

print "INFO: Adding prod clusters '{}'.".format(pe_ips)

for pe_ip in pe_ips.split(","):
  pe_ip = str.strip(pe_ip)
  count += 1
  if pe_ip == "":
    print "WARNING: Wrong entry on position: '{}', enrty will be skipped.".format(count)
    continue

  payload = {
    "username": pe_username,
    "url": pe_ip,
    "hypervisorType": "KVM",
    "password": pe_password
  }

  create_target_url = api_url + "/administration/clusters"
  try:
    headers = {'content-type': "application/json"}
    response = urlreq(create_target_url, verb='POST', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, params=json.dumps(payload), verify=False, headers=headers, timeout=time)
    if response.status_code != 202:
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
    target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
    job_uuid = target_create_status["entities"][0]["jobUuid"]
  except Exception as e:
    if response == "":
      print "ERROR: No response form HYCU controller."
      exit(1)
    else:
      target_create_status = json.loads(response.content)
      status = target_create_status['message']['detailsDescription']
      print "ERROR Message: '{}'.".format(status)
      exit(1)
  
  count = 1
  jobs_url = api_url + "/jobs/" + job_uuid
  while(True or count < finish):
    response = urlreq(jobs_url, verb='GET', auth="BASIC", user=username, passwd=password, verify=False)
    if response.status_code != 200:
      print "ERROR: Failed to get job status '{}'.".format(job_uuid)
      if response.status_code == 500:
        print "ERROR: Server internal error, retrying in 5 seconds".format(job_uuid)
        count += 1
        sleep(5)
    job_status = json.loads(response.content)
    if job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "OK":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{}' successful.".format(pe_ip)
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "WARNING":
      print "INFO: Adding cluster '{0}' successful with Warning".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      break
    elif job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ABORTED" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "FATAL" or job_status["entities"][0]["status"] == "ERROR":
      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
      print job_status["entities"][0]["taskExitMessage"]["debug"]
      exit(1)
    else:
      print "INFO: Addition of Cluster '{}' in-progress sleeping for 5 seconds.".format(pe_ip)
      sleep(5)

#script

hycu_ip = '@@{HYCU_IP}@@'
username = 'admin'
password = 'admin'
pe_ip = '@@{NTX_STORAGE_CLUSTER_URL}@@'

      print "ERROR: Adding cluster '{}' failed.".format(pe_ip)
